hibernate-mapping.query: from com.vimukti.accounter.core.User user where user.email=:emailid and user.passwordSha1Hash =:password
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT M.EMAILID, M.COMPANYNAME, M.NAME FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.USER_ID=:memberID
select c.id,c.emailId from CollaberIdentity C
SELECT u.notification_time1,u.notification_time2,u.notification_time3,u.notification_time4,u.timezones FROM user u where u.user_id=:userId
SELECT count(id) FROM unreadobject u where category NOT IN('Tasknotes','Calendar') and memberid=:userId
SELECT count(c.id) FROM collabermessage c where c.state='7' and c.identity_id=:userId

SELECT count(T.ID) FROM TASKNOTE T LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSTRACTTOOL A ON T.TOOL_ID = A.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WORKSPACE W ON A.SPACE_ID = W.SPACE_ID WHERE W.IS_PERSONAL_SPACE=true AND W.CREATOR = T.CREATED_BY AND T.completed = false AND T.CATEGORY='Contact Management' AND T.CREATED_BY =:userId

SELECT count(T.ID) FROM TASKNOTE T LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSTRACTTOOL A ON T.TOOL_ID = A.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WORKSPACE W ON A.SPACE_ID = W.SPACE_ID WHERE W.IS_PERSONAL_SPACE=true AND W.CREATOR = T.CREATED_BY AND T.completed = false AND T.CATEGORY!='Contact Management' AND T.CREATED_BY =:userId

SELECT count(c.id) FROM CALENDAREVENT C LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSTRACTTOOL A ON C.TOOL_ID = A.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WORKSPACE W ON A.SPACE_ID = W.SPACE_ID WHERE W.IS_PERSONAL_SPACE=true AND W.CREATOR = C.CREATED_BY AND C.EDATE >=:date AND C.CREATED_BY=:userId

SELECT count(C.ID) FROM CALENDAREVENT C LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSTRACTTOOL A ON C.TOOL_ID = A.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WORKSPACE W ON A.SPACE_ID = W.SPACE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN identity_spaces i on i.space_id = w.space_id WHERE W.IS_PERSONAL_SPACE=false AND C.EDATE >=:date AND i.identity_id=:userId

SELECT count(T.ID) FROM TASKNOTE T LEFT OUTER JOIN ABSTRACTTOOL A ON T.TOOL_ID = A.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WORKSPACE W ON A.SPACE_ID = W.SPACE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN identity_spaces i on i.space_id = w.space_id WHERE W.IS_PERSONAL_SPACE=false AND T.completed = false AND i.identity_id=:userId

SELECT count(t.id) FROM tasknote t left outer join abstracttool a on t.TOOL_ID=a.id left outer join workspace w on w.space_id=a.space_id where a.space_id=:spaceId and w.is_personal_space=false and t.completed=false

SELECT count(c.id) FROM calendarevent c left outer join abstracttool a on c.TOOL_ID=a.id left outer join workspace w on w.space_id=a.space_id where a.space_id=:spaceId and w.is_personal_space=false and c.edate>=:date
select COUNT(ID) as ID from COLLABERFILE cf
select COUNT(ID) as ID from DISCUSSIONTOPIC
select COUNT(SPACE_ID) as SPACE_ID from WORKSPACE
select COUNT(ID) as ID from COMMAND
select LOGINCOUNT as LOGINCOUNT from COLLABERIDENTITY
select LASTCONNECTED as lastConnected from COLLABERIDENTITY
select t.canVoidOrEdit from Transaction t where t.id = ?

select distinct(t.transactionDate) from Transaction t where t.transactionDate >= (select c.preferences.depreciationStartDate from Company c where c.id is not null) and t.transactionDate <= (select max(d.depreciateTo) from Depreciation d where d.status=?) order by t.transactionDate
select f from FixedAsset f where f.id=?
select je from Entry e inner join e.journalEntry je where e.journalEntryType=3 order by je.id
select t.number from Transaction t where t.type =:transactionType and t.id=:id
select je from Entry e inner join e.journalEntry je where e.customer.id=:customer order by je.id
select f.startDate from FiscalYear f where f.isCurrentFiscalYear=true
select je from Entry e inner join e.journalEntry je where e.debit!=0.0 and je.balanceDue>0.0 order by je.id
select je from Entry e inner join e.journalEntry je where e.vendor.id=:vendorId and e.credit!=0.0 and je.balanceDue>0.0 order by je.id
select je from Entry e inner join e.journalEntry je where e.customer.id=:customerId and e.debit !=0.0 and je.balanceDue>0.0 order by je.id
select min(v.VATperiodStartDate), max(v.VATperiodEndDate) from VATReturn v where v.taxAgency.id =:taxAgency
select entity.id from Account entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Vendor entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TAXAgency entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Customer entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Item entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TAXGroup entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TaxItemGroup entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Box1099 entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TAXCode entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TAXItem entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from ItemTax entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from CustomerGroup entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from VendorGroup entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from PaymentTerms entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from ShippingMethod entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from ShippingTerms entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from PriceLevel entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from ItemGroup entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from SalesPerson entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Payee entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from CreditRating entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Company entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Transaction entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Address entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Bank entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from CompanyPreferences entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Contact entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from CreditsAndPayments entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Currency entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Email entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Entry entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Fax entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from PaySalesTaxEntries entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Phone entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TaxRates entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from UnitOfMeasure entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from UserPreferences entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from JournalEntry entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Estimate entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TransactionMakeDeposit entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Invoice entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from CashPurchase entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from CashSales entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from CustomerCreditMemo entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from CustomerPrePayment entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from EnterBill entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from IssuePayment entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from PayBill entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from PaySalesTax entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from PurchaseOrder entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from ReceivePayment entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from SalesOrder entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TransferFund entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from VendorCreditMemo entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from WriteCheck entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from MakeDeposit entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from CreditCardCharge entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from User entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from FiscalYear entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from CommodityCode entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TransactionMakeDepositEntries entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from AccountTransaction entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from VATReturn entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Budget entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from ItemReceipt entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Expense entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from PayExpense entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from FixedAssetNote entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from FixedAssetHistory entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from CustomerRefund entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from FixedAsset entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Box entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from PayVAT entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from ItemBackUp entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TransactionCreditsAndPayments entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TransactionReceivePayment entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TransactionPayBill entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from VATReturnBox entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from Depreciation entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TAXRateCalculation entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from FinanceLogger entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from ReceiveVAT entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from TAXAdjustment entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from BrandingTheme entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from EmployeeDetail entity where entity.id=?
select entity.id from ClientStockTransfer entity where entity.id=?
select a.name from Account a where a.id=:id
select d from Depreciation d inner join d.fixedAsset where d.depreciateFrom >= ? and d.status=? and d.fixedAsset.id=?
update Entry set memo=:newName where memo=:oldName
hibernate-mapping.query: select t.transactionDate from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Transaction t where t.transactionDate <:date
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select at.account.id as accountId, sum(at.amount) as amount from AccountTransaction at where at.account.type in (14,15,16,17,18) and at.transaction.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate group by at.account.id
select d from Depreciation d inner join d.fixedAsset where d.depreciateFrom >= ? and d.status=? and d.fixedAsset.id=? group by d.fixedAsset.id
select e.voucherNumber from Entry e where e.id = (select max(e1.id) from Entry e1 )
select c.number from Customer c order by c.id
select f.assetNumber from FixedAsset f
select t.number from Transaction t where t.type =:transactionType
select p.name from Payee p where p.id=:id
select a.flow from Account a where a.id= (select max(a1.id) from Account a1 where a1.parent is null)
select count(*) from Account a where a.parent=:parent
hibernate-mapping.query: from com.vimukti.accounter.core.User user where user.isActive=true and user.userRole != 'Basic Employee'
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.PayBill pst where pst.payFrom.id =:accountID and pst.isVoid=false and pst.status =:status
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.PayVAT pv where pv.payFrom.id =:accountId and pv.isVoid=false and pv.status =:status
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.ReceiveVAT rv where rv.depositIn.id =:accountId and rv.isVoid=false and rv.status =:status
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.CreditCardCharge pst where pst.payFrom.id =:accountId and pst.isVoid=false and pst.status =:status
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.CashPurchase pst where pst.payFrom.id =:accountId and pst.isVoid=false and pst.status =:status
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.CustomerPrePayment cpp where cpp.depositIn.id =:accountId and cpp.isVoid=false and cpp.status =:status
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Account a where a.parent=:parent and a.flow !=:flow order by a.id
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Depreciation d where d.id=((select max(d1.id) from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Depreciation d1 where d1.depreciationFor = ? and d1.status=?))
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Depreciation d where d.depreciateFrom >= ? and d.status=?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Transaction t where t.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.FiscalYear f order by f.startDate
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.FiscalYear f where f.id !=:id and f.startDate < :startDate order by f.startDate desc
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Depreciation d where d.depreciateFrom >= ? and d.status=?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation vr where vr.transactionItem.transaction.id=? and vr.vatReturn is not null
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXAdjustment v where v.transactionDate between :fromDate and :toDate and v.isFiled = false
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation vr where vr.taxItem is not null and vr.taxAgency.id=:vatAgency and vr.transactionDate <= :toDate and vr.vatReturn is null
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation vr where vr.taxItem is not null and vr.taxItem.taxAgency.id=:vatAgency and vr.transactionDate > :toDate and vr.vatReturn is null
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.AccountTransaction at where at.transaction.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate order by at.account.number
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.FixedAsset f where f.status = 2 and f.purchaseDate <= ?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Account a where a.id in (:accountsList)
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Depreciation d where d.depreciateTo >= ? and d.status=?

from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation vr where vr.taxItem.taxAgency.id=:taxAgency and vr.taxItem is not null and vr.transactionDate between :fromDate and :toDate group by vr.id,vr.transactionItem,vr.taxItem order by vr.transactionItem,vr.taxItem

from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation vr where vr.taxItem is not null and vr.transactionDate between :fromDate and :toDate group by vr.id,vr.transactionItem,vr.taxItem order by vr.transactionItem,vr.taxItem
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXAdjustment v where v.taxItem.taxAgency.id=:taxAgency and v.transactionDate between :fromDate and :toDate order by v.taxItem
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXAdjustment v where v.transactionDate between :fromDate and :toDate order by v.taxItem
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.VATReturn v where v.taxAgency.id=:taxAgency and v.VATperiodEndDate between :fromDate and :toDate
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.VATReturn v where v.VATperiodEndDate between :fromDate and :toDate
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Account a where a.name =? and a.type =?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Account a where a.id = ? and a.type = ?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.CreditsAndPayments cp where cp.payee.id = ? and cp.balance > 0.0
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.FiscalYear f where f.id !=:id and f.startDate>=:startDate order by f.startDate
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXAdjustment v where v.taxItem.taxAgency.id=:vatAgency and v.transactionDate between :fromDate and :toDate and v.isFiled = false
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation vr where vr.taxItem is not null and vr.taxItem.taxAgency.id=:vatAgency and vr.transactionDate <= :toDate and vr.vatReturn is null
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Depreciation d where d.id =(select min(d1.id) from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Depreciation d1)
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Transaction t where t.type in (4,5,8,10) and t.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Depreciation d where d.depreciateFrom >= ? and d.status=?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.WriteCheck wc where wc.bankAccount.id = ? and wc.isVoid=false and wc.status = ?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.CustomerRefund cr where cr.isVoid=false and cr.status=?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.CustomerRefund cr where cr.payFrom.id = ? and cr.isVoid=false and cr.status=?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.PaySalesTax pst where pst.payFrom.id = ? and pst.isVoid=false and pst.status = ?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.CreditsAndPayments cp where cp.payee.id = ? and cp.balance > 0.0
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.FixedAsset f where f.status = 2 and f.purchaseDate <= ?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Depreciation d where d.id=((select max(d1.id) from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Depreciation d1 where d1.depreciationFor = ? and d1.status=?))

from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation v where v.taxItem is not null and v.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate and v.transactionItem.taxCode.isECSalesEntry = true group by v.id, v.transactionItem order by v.transactionItem

from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation v where v.taxItem is not null and v.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate and v.transactionItem.taxCode.isECSalesEntry = true group by v.id, v.transactionItem
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.CashPurchase cp where cp.employee.fullName=:employeeName and cp.expenseStatus=:expenseStatus and cp.type=:type and cp.isVoid=false
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.CashPurchase cp where cp.expenseStatus=:expenseStatus and cp.type=:type and cp.isVoid=false
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Entry e inner join e.journalEntry je where je.id =?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Estimate e where e.customer.id = ? and e.status = 0
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.FiscalYear fy where fy.status = 1 order by fy.startDate
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Transaction t where t.type =? and t.number =? and t.id !=?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.FinanceLogger order by id desc
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.FinanceLogger f where f.id >:lowerRange and f.id <=:upperRange order by f.id desc
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation vr where vr.transactionItem.transaction.id=? and vr.vatReturn is not null
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.VATReturn vt where vt.taxAgency.id=:taxAgency and vt.VATperiodEndDate=:endDate
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Item item where item.isIBuyThisItem = true
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation v where v.taxItem is not null and v.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate group by v.id, v.transactionItem order by v.transactionItem
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Item item where item.isISellThisItem = true
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.Account a where a.type not in (?,?,?)
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TransactionMakeDepositEntries at where at.transaction.isDeposited = 'false' and at.transaction.isVoid = 'false'

from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation pst where pst.taxAgency.salesLiabilityAccount.name != 'Un Deposited Funds' and pst.transactionItem.transaction != null and pst.taxDue != 0 order by pst.taxAgency.id
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXAdjustment t where t.taxAgency.salesLiabilityAccount.name != 'Un Deposited Funds' and t.journalEntry.balanceDue != 0 order by t.taxAgency.id
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation v where v.taxItem is not null and v.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate and v.vatReturn is null order by v.taxItem
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation v where v.taxItem is not null and v.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate order by v.taxItem
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXAdjustment v where v.taxItem.taxAgency.id=:taxAgency and v.transactionDate between :fromDate and :toDate and v.isFiled = false order by v.taxItem
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXAdjustment v where v.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate order by v.taxItem.name, v.journalEntry.transactionDate

from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation v where v.taxItem.name=:taxItemName and v.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate group by v.id, v.transactionItem order by v.transactionItem

from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXRateCalculation v where v.taxItem is not null and (v.isVATGroupEntry = true and v.taxItem != 4 and v.taxItem != 12 and v.taxItem != 14) or (v.isVATGroupEntry = false) and v.transactionDate between :startDate and :endDate group by v.id, v.transactionItem order by v.taxItem.name
delete from com.vimukti.accounter.core.TAXCode t where t.id=?
from com.vimukti.accounter.core.ServerCompany sc left join sc.clients c where sc.id=:id and c=:client
